text: If you don’t produce, you won’t thrive—no matter how skilled or talented you are.
what we choose to focus on and what we choose to ignore—plays in defining the quality of our life
Less mental clutter means more mental resources available for deep thinking.
Great creative minds think like artists but work like accountants.
You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
I don't stop when I'm tired, I stop when I'm done.
You gotta start your journey. It may suck, but eventually you will come out the other side on top.
Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage.
Every man has two lives, and the second starts when he realizes he has just one.
